tool_description: Determines applicable point earning rules based on transaction details, customer tier, merchant category, and current promotions.

customer_tier.description: Customer's loyalty tier (Bronze, Silver, Gold, Platinum)

merchant_category.description: Category of merchant (grocery, gas, dining, retail, travel, etc.)

transaction_date.description: Date of transaction to check for active promotions

is_online.description: Whether the transaction was made online

error_messages: Invalid tier: Customer tier must be one of Bronze, Silver, Gold, or Platinum.
Unsupported merchant category: Provided merchant category is not recognized.
Invalid transaction amount: Amount must be a positive number.
Invalid date format: transaction_date must be in ISO 8601 format.
Rules unavailable: Unable to retrieve current point earning rules.
usage: Provide customer tier, merchant category, transaction details to get applicable point earning rules. The tool considers current promotions and tier-specific multipliers.

base_points_per_dollar.description: Base points earned per dollar spent

category_bonus.description: Additional bonus points per dollar for merchant category

promotional_bonus.description: Extra points per dollar from active promotions

minimum_transaction.description: Minimum transaction amount to earn points

applicable_rules.description: List of rule names that apply to this transaction
